settings.review_embed_code: Trustpilot

settings.blurb_content: Access to our 72-hour Popup Party™ every 6 or 7 weeks
Build a timeless wardrobe with pieces you will love to wear again and again
Embrace your self-expression with carefully selected comfort-focused items

settings.section_title: When was the last time you got excited about fashion?
settings.section_description: Get password access to the andAndrea Popup Party™ and join our exclusive lifestyle product drop. Shop the latest Freedom Chic™️ styles available to members only, and benefit from FREE Express shipping.

settings.sect_description: Drop your email below and get aA-Lister access to andAndrea’s Popup Party™.

settings.content_paragraph:
The andAndrea Popup Party™ experience was designed with a singular focus in mind: YOU!

Led by the creative vision of Andrea Tonkin, our mission is to create garments with love and passion that you can feel good in.

After putting her fashion calling on hold to focus on motherhood, Andrea had an "Aha" moment that sprung her into action. Her journey since then, first as an internationally acclaimed personal stylist, and then when launching her own fashion brand, aims to shed fashion rules and inspire women to dress for comfort and confidence.

Everything you see is designed and meticulously checked by Andrea. If she doesn't love it, we don't sell it. That simple!

settings.button_label: Sign up to become an aA-Lister (and start counting down to our next PopUp Party)
Gain access to new products before we open to the public
Shop from the comfort of your home
Receive your new pieces in 2-5 days with aA-Lister DHL Express shipping

settings.section_description: Be the first to know about our next Popup Party™ and gain exclusive access to newly released pieces.

settings.colorbox1_title: Better for you and our planet
settings.colorbox1_paragraph: Our collection is only available for select times throughout the year. Be inspired 365 days — shop when your wardrobe needs quality pieces you will love.
settings.colorbox1_paragraph2: With our relaxed, flowy styles, we’re making clothes designed to flatter everybody and every body—no matter your age or shape.
settings.colorbox1_title3: From the boardroom to the beach
settings.colorbox1_paragraph3: Endless styling options for outfits that inspire confidence and comfort. Take your andAndrea pieces on holiday or create smart officewear outfits.

settings.cta_description: We believe that every woman has a right to feel pretty, regardless of what's on sale at the mall or trending on Instagram. That's why we design versatile pieces that will never go out of style— built for quality and timeless aesthetics. Pair with anything in your closet, from your favorite jeans to your most formal pants.

settings.faq_question: Can I shop before the andAndrea’s PopUp Party is live?
settings.faq_answer: Most of our garments are only available during our PopUp Parties. You can find a limited selection of beloved pieces in our andAndrea Sneak Peak Collection, available year-round.

settings.faq_question: What is the best way to prepare for a PopUp Party?
settings.faq_answer: Check out our Instagram page! We believe that there is no better way to showcase our garments than a lil aA-Twirl. You can see how our clothes are styled and get inspired by how other women have chosen to style their aA-mazing looks. Oh, and if you post piccys don’t forget to tag us so we can see them too.

settings.faq_question: I missed out on an item last time. Do you release the same garments again?
settings.faq_answer: Most of our garments are only available for one PopUp Party. However, we sometimes restock popular items for future PopUp Party collections. To make sure you are the first to know, find the product page item and click on “Email me when Available”. We will notify you as soon as it is back in stock.

settings.box_content: Designed with love and care in Australia
Made to last/ Focused on quality

settings.sect_description: Drop your email below and get aA-Lister access to andAndrea’s Popup Party™.
